    • Constructor Detail

      • DynamicCamera

        public DynamicCamera(Engine engine,
                     com.spartanlaboratories.measurements.Rectangle world,
                     com.spartanlaboratories.measurements.Rectangle monitor)

      • DynamicCamera

        public DynamicCamera(Engine engine,
                     Location screenSize)
        Creates a DynamicCamera object with default properties. The default properties are: the location of the display is the center of the monitor, the size of the display is the size of the monitor, the size of the world display has a 1:1 ratio to the size of the display, the world center is (0,0).
        Parameters:
        engine -
